subject: Re: [junit] Re: Can i do a assertion inside the setUp() method.
msgSnippet: Why to put an assertion in the setUp() method? I think it s nonsense... And why do you like it? ... From: Shaun Smith To: junit@yahoogroups.com Sent:
messageBody:
Why to put an assertion in the setUp() method? I think it's nonsense...
And why do you like it?

----- Original Message -----
From: Shaun Smith
To: 'junit@yahoogroups.com'
Sent: Thursday, January 15, 2004 11:07 AM
Subject: RE: [junit] Re: Can i do a assertion inside the setUp() method.


I do that. I can't think of a better way and I've never seen a better way.
Actually, I like it!

> > However, you should NEVER put an assertion in setUp().
>
> includes: assertTrue(new File("x").delete());a
